code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> Idle
    Idle --> Gated : Session/day filters & range gate pass
    Gated --> SignalCheck : Close[FinTech_PaymentGateway] vs Close[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    SignalCheck --> EntryBUY : Close[FinTech_TransactionQueue] >= Close[FinTech_FraudDetection] AND no SELLs
    SignalCheck --> EntrySELL : Close[FinTech_TransactionQueue] < Close[FinTech_FraudDetection] AND no BUYs
    EntryBUY --> BasketManage
    EntrySELL --> BasketManage
    BasketManage --> AddMore : |price - last_entry| >= Step AND count < MaxTrades
    AddMore --> BasketManage
    BasketManage --> SyncTP : compute avg price; set TP = avg ± TP_pts
    SyncTP --> Idle
    Idle --> EquityStop : floating P/L < 0 AND |P/L| > (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    Idle --> HiddenTP : Hidden_TP basket profit reached
    Idle --> DailyTarget : Use_Daily_Target and daily ≥ Daily_Target
    EquityStop --> Flat
    HiddenTP --> Flat
    DailyTarget --> Flat
    Flat --> Idle
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
